saveToFiles() - Method in class wikicategory.WikiCategory

W

wikicategory - package wikicategory
 
WikiCategory - Class in wikicategory
Given a category like "Category:Psychology" and an endpoint like http://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php this class will attempt to get all articles belonging to that category.
